item.title: ~$ whoami
item.description: Hi üëã, I’m Heath aka ghsinfosec. I didn’t start getting serious about cybersecurity until I was about 32. It all started with a YouTube video by a guy named John Hammond. You may have heard of him üòè … After a few years of consistent failure I could almost consider myself a mediocre hacker security researcher, occasional CTF player, and I find myself jumping down rabbit holes probably more often than I care to admit.

item.title: Welcome
